div2.entry: By Sundry other payments at New York &ca amg to
By Ditto pd for making Shirts for John Alton
By Exps. at Caroline Ct House 5/2 1/2 Ditto at Todds 10/
By Ditto at King Wm Ct House 10/. Spotswoods Chacka 13/3
By Cash to John Alton 10/10 Exps. at Doncastles 3/6
By cleaning my Pistols 3/9. Craik Sadlers acct 21/6
By Exps. at Todds 2/6. gave Danzies Servts 3/9. Fert P 5/.
By Postage of a Letter from Boston
By Doctr Beculler 10/. lent Captn Mercer for Do 10/
By Cash gave a Soldiers Wife 5/. Fish 2/6
By Cocks's Betty 5/. To a cripplis Nun 5/.
By Abram Vanmeter to buy Amn for his Fort
